data.name: Breach - Veil Demon DLC
data.detailed_description:
Every session is different in Breach with a new type of enemy: The Veil Demon. Play solo, co-op, or versus in missions where challenges change every time. Team up with friends to take on the Veil Demon, or play as the Veil Demon and destroy the heroes!

If you’re the kind of person that likes to throw pesky Mages around the arena, and prove that you’re the strongest around, the Breach Veil Demon Pack may be your perfect complement. By purchasing this pack, you’ll gain instant access to Breach Early Access, along with the following Veil Demon classes:

  • Veil Shifter Veil Demon Class
  • Dark Artificer Veil Demon Class
  • Soulfiend Veil Demon Class
  • Taskmaster Veil Demon Class

In addition to the classes above, we want to ensure your controllable Elite Monsters can look the part. As a Veil Demon, you can control every monster across the battlefield, including powerful Elites summoned from the Veil. Utilize your Elite Monsters while executing combos, casting spells, and evolving your unique set of powers throughout the mission.

We’re including a handful of additional Elite Monster Skins and some harrowing colors for your Veil Demon to really match your evil mood, alongside the following:

  • Veil Demon Eyes Spray
  • Veil Demon Wallpaper
  • Veil Demon Digital Artbook

Welcome to the Dungeon Brawl.

data.short_description: Every session is different in Breach with a new type of enemy: The Veil Demon. The Veil Demon Pack is the perfect complement for the demon inside of you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel Nehalem Processor (ex, Core i3/i5/i7)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or ATI Radeon 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel Nehalem Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.5 GB Nvidia GTX 660 or ATI Radeon 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
